Package client.Controllers

Class SearchChatController

java.lang.Object
client.Controllers.mainPage
client.Controllers.SearchChatController
public class SearchChatController
extends mainPage
this class is similar to the SearchPageController but it checks if the searched user for chatting is available or not due to the blocking.

      public void searchUser​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
